results.title: Effect of amlodipine on ventricular hypertrophy in hypertension patients: a systematic review and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ treatment also significantly reduced the LV @<m>DISEASE_MASS_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536030 @@@mass@@@ index.

results.title: Long-term antihypertensive treatment fails to improve E/e' despite regression of left ventricular mass: an Anglo-Scandinavian cardiac outcomes trial substudy.
results.text_hl: Five hundred thirty-six @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ had complete data collection at both phases. Left @<m>DISEASE_MASS_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536030 @@@ventricular mass@@@ index regressed from phase 1 to 2 with no significant difference between treatment groups (@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@: 119.5-116.8; @CHEMICAL_Atenolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@: 122.9-117.5; P<0.001 for both).

citations.NLM: Barron AJ, Hughes AD, Sharp A, Baksi AJ, Surendran P, Jabbour RJ, Stanton A, Poulter N, Fitzgerald D, Sever P, O'Brien E, Thom S, Mayet J, ASCOT Investigators. Long-term antihypertensive treatment fails to improve E/e' despite regression of left ventricular mass: an Anglo-Scandinavian cardiac outcomes trial substudy. Hypertension. 2014 Feb;63(2):252-8. PMID: 24218432

results.title: Effects of the calcium channel antagonist amlodipine in cats with surgically induced hypertensive renal insufficiency.
results.text_hl: PROCEDURE: Following @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@reduction@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_MASS_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536030 @@@renal mass@@@, 10 @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@ were administered 0.25 mg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@/kg, PO, q 24 h (group A).

citations.NLM: Mathur S, Syme H, Brown CA, Elliot J, Moore PA, Newell MA, Munday JS, Cartier LM, Sheldon SE, Brown SA. Effects of the calcium channel antagonist amlodipine in cats with surgically induced hypertensive renal insufficiency. Am J Vet Res. 2002 Jun;63(6):833-9. PMID: 12061529

results.title: Cardiovascular structural changes and calcium antagonist therapy in patients with hypertension.
results.text_hl: After 6 months of treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ 5-10 mg o.d., significant reductions in @<m>DISEASE_MASS_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536030 @@@LV mass@@@ index (p = 0.004) and forearm min VR (p = 0.02) were observed.

citations.NLM: Agabiti-Rosei E, Muiesan ML, Rizzoni D, Zulli R, Calebich S, Castellano M, Cavaliere G, Nordio G, Pasini F, Zuccato F. Cardiovascular structural changes and calcium antagonist therapy in patients with hypertension. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1994;24 Suppl A():S37-43. PMID: 7603076

results.title: Effects of the dihydropyridine calcium channel blocker amlodipine on ventricular and atrial protein synthesis in an aortic constriction model of hypertension and, following chronic treatment, in the left ventricle of SHR rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ (10 mg/kg/body weight) therapy for 30 weeks caused regression of @<m>DISEASE_MASS_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536030 @@@LV mass@@@, total protein, RNA and DNA contents.

citations.NLM: Patel VB, Siddiq T, Sherwood R, Richardson PJ, Preedy VR.
